message:
昨天在G+上发了一张图，然后看到如下回复：

My name Adiva,
i am 24 years old girl
I went through your profile
It is very interesting
for me, then you can contact
With my e-mail
I'll give you my picture from there
And I tell you more about myself.
Adiva's kiss.

sdkluv1@gmail.com

"Remember, the greatest gift is not found in a store nor under a tree, but in the hearts of true friends"

第一感觉是惊讶，然后觉的太离奇了，用google搜索了一下邮箱帐号，在另一个网站上看到了同样的发言。

另求最后一句出处，感觉在哪听到过。
title: 被骗了。。。。？
userSign: (明天，我就要去屠龙（失恋了，不想再屠龙了） ...)
